column4: yes i have a ubuntu 9.10 cd, cofirm,ed 100% error free (nice program by the way, built in and all), so i dont get this
and i dont understand the grub command for installing it via the terminal
the system says there is no master boot record, so it cant boot.
if it wheren't for the live cd, i wouldnt have a machine right now
why do you use apt-get to install what is already there...??
nope. nothing to do with windows.
i want to know how to have grub install itself to the hard drive, thats what i meant

no wuni install. i told ubuntu it could have one whole drive. it then took that drive and formatted it, installed ubuntu, but idd not install a mbr or grub. windows no longer exists on this computer and is out of the equation.
this is the second time in installed. i am not gonna reinstall again just to be reinstalling this xchat program just to tell you it didnt work for a third time
have you specified the /boot while doing a partioning portion of the wubi install?
you mean to say the grub is not installing itself in the hard disk or the mbr?? on new installation??
there is nothing much to it, by the way you can specify which is the boot partition while installing, its just simple
open gparted and check whats the name of your hdd
sorry i dint tracked your issue
you mean to say you have another hdd with pclinuxos on it? and the one you are using for ubuntu is a second one?
thanks for the help. this is a bug, ofcoarse i want the mbr on the ubuntu drive... ill make sure to let someone know on the forum
thats why i love ubuntu, community help. thanx all! i gotta log off now, gotta re-install ubuntu.
